text:
Hi guys welcome to Genevieve's Playhouse.
Today we have some sofia the first blind bags

and a sofia the first toy variety pack. In the
variety pack we have clover the rabbit, sofia,

minimus the flying horse, amber, and crackle
the dragon. Let's go ahead and open this up

and take a look at these. Alright. Here's
Sofia's rabbit friend clover and he's a cute

kind of grayish little bunny and he's got
brown eyes, a little carrot in his hand, a

white tummy and a white tail and he's got
a little stand here. His stand does not come

off, and that will keep him from falling over.
And this seems like good quality plastic,

it doesn't seem like his ears are going to
come off or anything like that, so that's

cool. Let's take out Sofia. And here's Sofia
in her usual purple ball gown. She's got these

little designs on here that look like flowers,
and these look like pearls, her white petticoat,

with a purple design here. She has on a silver
tiara, brown hair, blue eyes. Very pretty.

And this is a good weight for this toy, it's
not too light and it's not too heavy also.

Next we'll get out Minimus the flying horse.
Alright, here's minimus, and he's different

from the other flying horses that they have
in Enchancia, he has kind of short stubby

legs, and when Sofia first found him he really
didn't know how to fly, but they learned how

to fly together, and now he's a really great
flying horse. He's got his purple mohawk,

his wings, his blue saddle for Sofia. He's
just a very cute little flying horse. Up next

we have Amber. Amber is Sofia's sister. Sometimes
Amber can be a little self-centered but she's

a good person deep down and Sofia helps her
out with, you know, thinking about others

for a change, and not just herself. But like
I said, she is a good person on the inside.

She just has to be reminded sometimes that
it's not always about her. She has a pink

fan here, silver tiara, blonde hair, brown
eyes, and her yellow ball gown. Very cute.

And last, but not least, is Crackle the dragon.
Very cute. He's got some purple flames coming

out here. And Crackle is kind of a seagreen
color. He's got some purple scales here. Little

horns here. Very cute little dragon and she
also comes with a stand. I really like these

toys. Disney always does a good job with their
figures. Alright, now that we've got our variety

pack out of the way. Let's go ahead and open
up these blind bags that we have here. Now

when I first went to the store and was looking
at Sofia the first merchandise, I didn't even

know that they had blind bags, so I was pretty
excited to find that out. And this is the

first series, and inside each blind bag is
a collectible mini figure. And on the back

it shows us which figures we can get. So we
can get Sofia in her purple gown, Sofia in

her blue gown, Vivian in her pink gown, and
Vivian is actually Crackle's owner, there's

the rabbit Clover, there's Minimus, there's
Sofia in her riding outfit, there's James,

Sofia's brother, and there's Amber, Sofia's
sister. And it looks like there is a rare

glitter Sofia that we can collect. So maybe
we'll get her. I don't know. Alright let's

open this up and see what we get. First up
is Minimus! This is actually a pretty nice

figurine here, and his wings don't open. That's
okay. We have Minimus with his open wings

back here. He's got his purple mohawk. Looks
like he has green eyes. Here's his saddle

for Sofia to ride on. Very cute. Alright let's
see what we get next. So our next Sofia the

first blind bag. Aww, we got Crackle! Very
cute. And this Crackle is not breathing fire

as you can see. Still very cute though. I
like how her wings are really little. Very

cute. Alright our next Sofia blind bag contains
Clover! Here's Clover the bunny, he's very

cute. You know these are actually really good,
sturdy toys for blind bag toys. Some of them

you know are pretty good, like these, and
some of them are kind of cheapy. But these

aren't. These are really good plastic toys,
they don't look like they're going to fall

apart and they have pretty good detail on
them. Alright, and our next blind bag contains

Minimus again! So now Minimus has a twin.
Minimus one and Minimus two. Very cute. Alright

our next blind bag is. Oh my goodness, we
have another Minimus! Minimus the third! Alright

let's see who's going to be in this one. And
it is, Sofia in her blue ballgown. And this

one has this little top part here that comes
down to a point that's got like a light baby

blue color and we have a darker blue color
here, and even darker blue color at the bottom

with little seashells. That's cool it's kind
of like hombre, because it starts light and

it gets darker. And the top of her dress is
about the same shade of this blue here and

she has a silver tiara and she has her purple
amulet on that allows her to talk to animals.

She has a really nice design on the back here
that's pretty cool. I really like this one.

I wish that we could see Sofia in a blue dress
more often. Alright let's open our next blind

bag and we have Sofia in her riding outfit.
She comes in a little plastic thing that keeps

her from getting damaged. Alright so here's
Sofia in her riding outfit, and this is what

she wears when she races on Minimus. And she
has her helmet here which, you know, keeps

her safe in case she falls. She has a purple
jacket with a lavender detail. She has her

purple amulet as you can see. Purple pants
and black riding boots and she has a cape

in the back as well. Very pretty. And she
has a little stand here to help her stand

up. So that's good. Alright we're down to
our last three. Up next we have Amber! And

here she is in her yellow dress, with her
pink fan. She has her silver tiara. Very cool!

Let's put amber over here. Okay we're down
to our last two blind bags, let's see who's

in this one. And it's James! Well that's great,
so now we have the brother and the two sisters.

Alright so here's James. And he has his green
jacket here with the long coattails in the

back and he has white knee-high socks and
black shoes, tan pants, blue bow tie, and

he has blonde hair just like Amber. He's got
his hands behind his back here and he also

has a purple stand so that he can stand up.
Very cool. Alright here's our last Sofia the

first blind bag and inside we have another
Sofia in the blue dress. That's very cool,

I really like this dress. And you can see
she's got blue shoes on here to match her

dress. Alright guys, I hope you enjoyed opening
these toys as much as I did. Make sure to

like the video and leave a comment on who's
your favorite. And be sure to subscribe to

our channel. Alright guys, thanks and see
you later! =)
